msContents.summary: Account book? The contents of five folders may be from the same papyrus, possibly an account book; some entries have check marks against them

msItem.note: Because the fragments are so brittle they have not been individually measured
The papyrus is very brittle and has darkened; considerable surface peeling has occurred
The hand is a fine cursive

Approximate number of pieces per folder: Folder 17: 1 large fragment, 2 smaller fragments, many tiny fragments; Folder 18: 4 large fragments, 1 small fragment; Folder 19: 2 large fragments, 1 medium fragment; Folder 20: 3 large fragments, 2 medium fragments; Folder 22: 2 large fragments, 5-6 medium fragments, several tiny fragments

physDesc.p: Multiple papyrus fragments; Dimensions vary from less than 1 cm. x 1 cm. to ca. 16.2 x 9.5 cm

provenance.p: Garrett Deposit 1924, no. in H. I. Bell's inventory
